name: Wiggle the sailor
description: This is a fun game about a   sailor with   scurvy. Since you have scurvy  your strength is low and takes a bit to build back up. You have to use your strength wisely to get to the end of each level.    It is a medium difficulty game. I recommend playing in full screen. Good luck!  This is version 1.3.1 (fixed some mobile controls ) (Next version  fixing some bugs).
